alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mobile, Washington, central Clarke, northeastern George, northeastern Perry, Wayne and Greene Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1131 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Barnett to 7 miles southwest of Silas to 9 miles east of Coffeeville. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saraland, Satsuma, Jackson, Waynesboro, Citronelle, Lucedale, Creola, Chatom, Richton, Leakesville, Chunchula, Wagarville, Saint Stephens, Leroy, Clara, Gulfcrest, Deer Park, Axis, Tibbie and Beaumont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
